onny was a piece of enchanted fabric from Waterdeep that was folded into a makeshift bandana in the late 15 century DR.
Bonny was a navy-blue piece of cloth with a light-blue shape on its middle.
Bonny allowed the wearer to cast a burst of powerful healing magic onto an ally.
At some point in the late 15 century DR, Calliope found herself preparing to raid a midnight ball somewhere in Waterdeeps Sea Ward. The bard knew that she would either need a mask or a good bandage and sliced a piece of Mirt the Moneylenders coat for that very purpose. Little did she know that the coat and the fabric she took from the unsuspecting Old Wolf was imbued with powerful restorative enchantments.
*Calliope a bard adventurer who worked with other warriors of Waterdeep, performing missions on behalf of Laeral Silverhand in the late 15 century DR.
